attributes.action: election for a new prime minister as this one's not applying fair democracy E.G statment about EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: The general feeling that he is not letting the people in his party come too their own decision on weather the should be a referendum, as publish in the news artical's, because of this it is in the people's interest, that should be an automatic discussion weather, he is really fit too be a prime minister in a democartic society. if found guilty the should be an automatic election, due too improper conduct.
